casebody.data:
ATHENS
v.
MCCLAIN 2019-0693 Supreme Court of Ohio. August 6, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENT

O'Connor, C.J., and DeWine, J., dissent.

APPEAL ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

Appeal accepted on proposition of law No. I.

Kennedy, French, and Stewart, JJ., would accept the appeal on both propositions of law.
